place_name: Queen City Tea Bar | Olde Whitehall

reviews_data.review_text: Pays employees in cash only? Weird

This is where I was first introduced to Boba tea and my life has never been the same. I don't know how I lived without boba before this. I am addicted to it. I love it. It's absolutely amazing. Pure perfection. And I'm definitely not being hyperbolic. But really, Queen City Tea Bar has amazing boba tea and they also have really good Vietnamese iced coffee.
Always good!

So nice to have a good tea spot close to home. Great selection and you can mix and match and customize as much as you want. Also, if you have kids they can have a spin on their wheel to win prizes with a good report card. We won a free French fry and 15% off anything. Pretty cool way to make some kids proud too. Love this place for that.

Never been here before and I'm from Gastonia, NC visiting Charlotte. This is a great place to get boba and not too far from where I was headed home. Great selection on boba teas and slushies. Really clean and nice customer service. The lady on the phone helped me find the location and was very kind to me. I appreciate their help! This is my Oreo slushie with boba. It's so delicious and refreshing. Definitely reccomend!
Vietnamese coffee was amazing!
Very very watery, good boba balls. The liquid part, is üëéüèºüëéüèº

I just happened upon this place and I was delighted to find there were delicious tea choices. The clerk was really helpful and offered great suggestions for my first milk tea experience. I really enjoyed the Lavender coconut oat milk tea. The interior of the Cafe is lovely and an enjoyable place to hang out. I delicious recommend a visit.
Great staff and selection üôÇ! Bravo üëè
Hands down the best bubble tea place in Charlotte

I feel really bad for the girl at the counter, seems like the other three employees just don't help. Drinks were terrible, no flavor and barely even a smoothie, had to grind the ice down with my teeth. These reviews are very confusing as maybe I caught it at a bad time? Maybe there is a secret door in the back where the good drinks and service are located?

Not entirely sure how this place has a lot of good reviews.. my first time visiting and will be my last. I came in with questions about boba tea. Such as what one would taste similar to brown sugar, if they came sweetened, etc. The gentleman helping me gave me one word responses and just seemed like he didn't even want to be there. Overall, poor attitude.. not asking for all smiles but like I'm asking for your help.. My drink was pretty bland and I was really disappointed. Wasn't sweet at all, nor taste like brown sugar. Simply tasted like black tea with milk. The tapioca bobas also were so soft, denigrating, tasted like nothing. Snot constancy really. I asked my friend about it and he said that's not how my drink should've tasted at all. Hopefully other people get treated better than I did. Really am sad about this first experience. Will try elsewhere instead of Queen City..

I normally get same drink from Share Tea and this local tea is on point, brilliant. Strong, nice scent and bitter roasted Oolong tea with milk and boba. The boba is bit soft for my taste. Highly recommend you guys order less sugar to get the full taste of drink. Pro: student and military discount
Loved it! I got the dragon fruit green tea. The chick with the pink hair was very informative! Absolutely recommend trying this place!
We love the popcorn chicken bites, taro smoothie, and QC milk tea! QC Tea Bar is definitely one of our go-to's in the Charlotte area.

The taro boba took our smoothies to another level! This is probably, by far, my favorite place for taro smoothies now in the CLT area. The staff was very friendly and very patient while we navigated their menu. The options here were fun and different from most. We will absolutely be back again every time we come back to this part of CLT. Thanks for a great experience and delicious boba!
Boba is really soft.  They don't have avacado or hot drinks today. Finally got mango strawberry smoothie which is really sweet
1st time ever getting Boba tea and had a amazing  time. The lady taking our order was kind, helped us out with the drinks. Will definitely come back in the future.
Lots of options

I've been coming here for years now so I'm a bit taken aback about what I witnessed today. I come in tonight to surprise my family with something different for dinner. Needless to say I left hungry and still in search for food. When I walked in I noticed one of the workers keep messing in his nose then sat down to be on his phone when everyone else was working. The next person orders & he goes straight to the kitchen and starts preparing food. The icing on the cake for me was when he blew his nose & still didn't wash his hands. I haven't even gotten to him constantly scratching his arms. I asked who was in charge & told them of his nasty habits. He admitted to not washing his hands bc he put on gloves. THAT MEANS NOTHING IF YOUR HANDS WERE DIRTY WHEN YOU TOUCHED THEM! The young lady in charge made his wash his hands but the damage was done. I strongly suggest the owner review the cameras. It doesn't matter if it's his first job or not those are disgusting habits especially in the food industry.
We love boba tea. Glad this is not the only place in Charlotte. Will not be back... guy taking order was very rude.
Nope they servings what they want not what u ask for it!!!
Lots of options with fast and friendly service.

Cute set up. However, I would not recommend if you desire a nutritional smoothie with real fruits and vegetables. I've never heard of a smoothie place that doesn't serve a green smoothie.. there were no greens on site. Very telling. I watched the staff member make my smoothie and he literally was just scooping in what seemed to be flavored sugar or powdered versions of a banana or strawberry. I didn't see actual strawberries go into the smoothie, it was this like jelly substance. No real fresh food for actual nourishment. I think their use of the term smoothie is misleading. It was so much sugar it gave my mom a headache. Thank goodness I stayed to watch them make the smoothie. I asked for oat milk and if I wasn't standing there the young man would have given me whole milk which could be a major issue for someone who is plant based or vegan. I had turned away for a second and when I turned back I saw he was filling the smoothie with the red cap milk, which is whole milk. He had to do the smoothie over. The unfortunate part is that folks would order this, thinking they are doing good by ordering a smoothie and they're really just getting flavoring, sugar, and whole milk. Not okay. Giving two stars because the two staff members were sweet and gentle. They're just trying to do their job so this review is not a reflection of them but rather the owner's business strategy on using the term smoothie as a buzz term but feeding people junk. That's not okay.

Just what I need every time! I love boba milk teas and Queen City Tea Bar satisfies my cravings every time! My go-to is the Crazy Taro. Their food is also good. My husband and I have tried the chicken wings, fries, and short-ribs. Best of all, I love how it's a short trip from home.
The popcorn chickens is great. The milk tea also great. Stay away from the ‚Äúbanh mi‚Äù . I eat banh mi over 40 yrs. Nothing tase like this ‚Äúbanh mi‚Äù. The services is ok.

Such a cute little spot with REALLY GOOD tea! I go for milk tea and I  always am shocked with how good my order is.  It's always a hit for me because of the way you can customize your drink from milk type to ice and sweetness levels and the different kinds of toppings you can add. They also have snacks and icecream! If you're looking to try milk tea, go here, you won't be disappointed.
If you ask me, it is a bit overpriced, still, their teas taste very good. Their food is Korean style and even though it is small and a lot of people tends to visit, the service is very kind and fast.

I wish I can give this place a 10*  Absolutely amazing. They have wide range varieties of tea and coffee with even greater range of flavors and toppings. Well bottomings since the toppings sink to the bottom. #dadjoke  Anyways, staff is extremely friendly. This was the first time having boba tea for me. IK wth. The person that was taking order helped me very patiently (thank you and sorry lol), explained the ingredients and made the most amazing first boba tea of mine. I have gone to this place 3 days in the last 5 days.  Keep up the good work QC Tea Bar!!

Ordered two Vietnamese coffees, ($5 each) one was filled to top and one was half way filled.  Asked that she add more to the half full one and she said ‚Äúsorry, they are really strong and we aren't allowed to fill them up‚Äù.  Last time going here‚Ä¶.

This is a great spot! Great atmosphere, friendly staff, and the food and drink are really good! I wasn't expecting the food or smoothies to be any good at a tea place, but they were delicious. I just wish there were herbal tea options since I don't drink caffeine anymore. Will definitely come here again!

Love this place. Found a new spot for my gf and I. The food's great and so is the service!  Had an awesome time and the employees are cool, Oh, and they have a chalkboard by the bathroom which was fun too!

I really love the drinks and the aesthetics but it's not getting all 5 because the customer service is terrible. Y'all don't get me wrong but I go in to get boba üßã cause I'm having a good day or to cheer up my day and I get that they don't owe me anything but doesn't it help to be at least a little cheerful.

Couple day ago. rin and i come from work. our car ran out of gas. 30 miles away from home. It's so empty street. Without help. we choose to walk home middle of the warm wind and hot day. So then We're walked we walked and we walked. we're so exhausted from the walked. we are hungry and thirsty. Rin and i shared one small bottle of water. but it's not enough for us to get home. we kept going but still will not make it to the house.  it's so empty road. Rin and i desire to give up already. But suddenly we look on the front of us. there is a beautiful triangle building and the big sign was so bright. i look up it's said: Queen City tea bar. my eyes open so big. and my friend rin was like ‚Äúyes yes yes ‚Äù yelling. me and my friend rin. so excited and ran into the door at the same time. and than we got stuck at the door. we're can't do anything. but There is a beautiful barista come and rescued us from door. she look like an angel to us. and than she's brought us to the order line. ‚Äù she said: ‚Äúhow can i help y'all. ‚Äú i quickly reply ‚Äú i want 2 pork bbq sandwich. extra meat and 2 coconut milk tea with coffee boba for two of us. And than A few minutes later. she handed the food and drinks to us. and we quickly ran to the table. and sat down. and eat our the best QC pork bbq sandwiches. and so tasty QC milk tea. Thank to Queen City tea bar. because of the Queen City tea bar we can make it to gas station and make it home that day.

This is my favorite place to go for a week day when it is rainy or had a bad day, always a great experience. Even when the drink is what you asked for, they would suggest something different and would give you the drink for free so you can try the variation. Personnel diversity is great, I was eve surprise that some of them could speak my mother tongue. They also have raffles and we won it. They didn't do it on 2021 or maybe I missed it. Thanks.

The lobby area is small but it is very nicely decorated. There are food and drink options which is pretty neat. The staff was super friendly and helpful. My taro smoothie turned out pretty good. I will have to come back and check the place out. They do have a prettty awesome student discount option and a little spin wheel to win awesome prizes with them if you bring your report card showing that you got Straight As, A/B, or Straight Bs which is pretty cool. I definitely recommend!
the lady here made it feel like I was interrupting here day when I ordered. and it was realllllly sweet
Amazing teas and lots of variety.
Really tasteful!
My daughter rates it 10/10 for their Boba tea, and I enjoy their cajun fries and Korean BBQ. Highly recommend!
Good tea, good service
We always order the popcorn chicken with cayenne pepper & Thai chili sauce. Always the best.
Great for an afternoon treat
They bubbly things at the bottom weren't even in there. I didn't ask for y'all to part the Red Sea, just wanted the bubble stuff. Goofy.

THEY HAVE OAT MILK! On their online menu it doesn't state it but to my surprise, I order from UberEats for lunch and oat milk was an option. I was so excited. Many places have soy (which I stay away from personally) and Almond milk as the only dairy free options. Almond milk it's not good to me in boba. It lacks the creaminess that oat milk and coconut milk have. They do update their UberEats menu whenever they run out.  Anyway, I ordered Taro Milk Tea, Hazelnut Tea and Cajun Fries (w/ honey mustard). I swear the Taro was sooooooooooo good. I almost ordered another one. Also, I don't know where they get their honey mustard but that thing is Crack. So good! Best Cajun fries I've had. Lastly, they have way more boba options than most places like Cherry Bloom Boba. So unique!  I took away 1 star because they don't have BROWN SUGAR BOBA.
I love this place

Absolutely love the place! Great variety of boba teas (different type of boba pearls also), smoothies, slushies. Food bites are great roo, my favorites are cauliflower fries and fried tofu. The cafe's decor is very original and has a great vibe to it. Always very clean too! Service is always courteous and fast!  Great to have a place like this in the neighborhood!

Great local place for tea and a quick bite. This was my first time visiting but loved the vibe and interior. Got some work done on my day off with an amazing matcha hulk tea and crispy spicy cauliflower fries.
Absolutely love this place! They have a very welcoming and chill atmosphere and the best workers ‚ù§.
The Earl Grey Milk Tea is great. They add a bit too much jelly for me, so I always get a half order of that. My fianc√©e loves their mocha as well.

This is my favorite Bubble Tea shop in NC! Their food is great especially the Taiwanese popcorn chicken and sweet potato fries. I always get the same here which is the Almond Milk Tea with 80% sugar and regular ice with extra pearls. My favorite part of ordering bubble tea is that you can choose your ice levels and sweetness. So for anyone who is new to the Boba Tea scene don't feel too pressured but you have the options of choosing toppings, sweetness levels and ice levels! Every time I come up to Charlotte I choose this place. Highly recommend their food and drinks here.
Quick, friendly service. Drinks are cute and delicious!
Really great selection!
Great service! I loved how they gave their personal recommendations. I highly recommend the avocado smoothie drink w/ boba!
Best Boba in town! And they cater to vegans with the Vietnamese boba.
Pretty good yeah, genuis
Their lavender milk tea is amazing!
Tea is fantastic! Food is a little bit strange

Amazing Vietnamese coffee!  Only recently learned about this delicious beverage and Queen City Tea Bar is the best I've had!  This rich drink is the treat we all deserve.  It is an amazing treat for hot Carolina days!
The bubble tea was good.
Feel hot drink a smoothie ,tea ,or a milk tea. Delicious to easy a hot day.
I love the tea flavor variety, not to mention the interior design used to have that queen city vibes is very smart.
Underrated food - get popcorn chicken and Cajun fries with your drink
No real fruit in smoothies out side of processed purees, likely with added sugar... Topped off with fruit syrups... Sugar sugar sugar, not healthy options.
This place has huge selection of teas and you can customize anyway you want. I had the strawberry spritzer and it was refreshing. I'll be back

This place is awesome! There boba tea is great! It's only 14 minutes away from where I live! 10/10! would recommend getting the Almond milk tea with Taro boba, Great Combo! also there food is amazing! And they have great service! If you love cauliflower and your looking for a good place to eat, go here! There fried spicy cauliflower is the absolute best! And there chicken tenders are great too, so if you love boba and food come here!
Just ordered a simple black milk tea with oat milk. Took me back to memories I didn't even know I remembered. Great Boba spot.

Updated Review I miss this place so much.  The staff was kind, the music was pretty good and the boba tea was yummm.  They had so many options of different boba.  Matcha boba, crystal boba, classic tapioca black pearls and aloe for my friends that like tea but not boba pearls so much. I also do enjoy the food a lot.  The fries and the cauliflower was so yum.  There is a parking lot which is a plus.  Makes it so easy to visit.  I do wish they'd do better about the timing when it comes to giving someone tea and there hot food as stated in my previous review.  But I had to update this review since I have been away from this place and just miss it so much.  --------------------------- Previous Review They will bring food out before tea is ready. So if you're grabbing and going, your food will be cold. I asked about it and they said there's nothing they can do. When they could easily either hurry up the drink order or just wait to cook until after the drink is done. So dumb.
Amazing tea but please update hours. Closed at 10:30 Saturday morning. Google states 9am it's open.

Tried to order through doordash. was contacted by the driver who told me they were basically out of everything i tried to order, no earl gray tea, no lemonade, etc. What kind of tea place doesn't have basic tea. If you're out of an item, deactivate it so people  don't try to order it. I should have just gone to Starbucks.
This place was really great! The food nice and warm, and their tea is great! I suggest the Taro smoothie with Cheese Cream blended in.
Nice for quick breakfast snack. Near the corporate buildings in Whitehall area.
I did not like the attention, they did not give me what I asked for and they were confused with my order
the best boba I've ever tasted. I got the rose milk tea with tapioca pearls and it's amazing. I'm definitely coming here again.
Love love love this place.
Super cute place with military discounts and easy online/in person ordering. You can make lots of adjustments to your drinks. Would definitely come back here again.
Delicious and a friendly place! I love it üòÄ
I love this spot. Smoothies and teas are good. So much variety with the drinks.

I love QC tea bar They make there boba fresh which is a bonus for me because one time I had horrible stale Boba it wasn't fresh it looks so old and the drink was just so bad. But when I decided to try boba milk tea again it was amazing I would come back here again. If you love strawberries get this drink it is the best one ever and I think boba milk tea is better cold
Oh how I missed Queen City Tea Bar. I came in for a.sad.reason but glad i got to drop by before going back to Florida. Mmmm that popcorn chicken.
The drinks are all fresh, fun, and delicious. The boba is always excellent. The staff is friendly and courteous; a great place to treat yourself!

I'm a current customer from this location, I love their service and its products, but sadly today I went in a hurry and order a smoothie, I specifically told them to not put Boba in my smoothie, but when I received my order it had some in it, so I asked them to make me a new one because that was not what I order, but the guys who made my drink just took the boba out and gave me the same drink, which was watering and still had a tasted of Boba and it wasn't full anymore. Since I was in a hurry so I just grabbed my drink and left, but I'm very disappointed with my experience today.

I decided to go because of all of the good reviews but once I got there either they didn't care about my business or didn't want it. I asked about the flavor profile for the Hokkaido tea and both employees stated that "it's just black tea." Having been to multiple boba tea places,  other businesses are able to give me an idea of what the different teas are like. I was looking forward to trying something different but I should've just gone to my regular boba place. When I arrived I was the only customer in the shop. After ordering, it literally took them 15 min to make 2 drinks. I'm not sure what it was but one employee me it and the other one just stood around instead of helping. The teas were ok but the overall experience was weird and awkward.  It was at the Whitehall location.
My favorite tea bar in Charlotte that I've tried so far. I have tried 2 others and the taro milk tea is my drink of choice
Great bubble tea.
Love it!!
My first time trying boba, omg my mouth exploded with pleasure
Food is great and Boba tea is awesome.  The price is a bit high though.
Greta experience here! Love all their small bites of food and the bubble tea options they give
Wonderful selection of delicious bubble tea options. I typically call my order in ahead of time to skip the line. You can also order online now. I love the convenience.
Love this place. We got here at least once a week.
My favorite drink is black milk tea with sea salt foam. Their popcorn chicken has been my favorite snack since they opened. I highly recommend try out their Gochujang sweet chili dipping sauce.
Easily some of the best boba tea you can get in the area. Will continue to come here whenever I can!
Very cool place! Glad I found out it was here.

Queen City Tea Bar is a unique cafe that sells different variations of tea with many flavors to choose from. They also sell smoothies, wings, and fries. It was our first time there and they were very patient while explaining everything to my wife and I. I had the kumquat flavored green tea, and it was delicious. I will definitely be going back there to try the other varieties and flavors.
Visited this hidden gem with my friend for the first time, we absolutely loved it ‚ù§  Definitely we will be back very soon...
Love this place
Excellent teas, choose your own size customize your tea and you are good to go. Great prices and wonderful boba tea!
Great boba. Great service. Worth the drive from Fort Mill.
Favorite tea place in Charlotte!

Order took forever, probably 25 minutes, maybe longer. And they managed to mess it up ( lots of ice instead less ice, different flavor...). They get online offers and if you a walk in customer... we'll, you just wait, and wait... and wait... Not all employees were wearing gloves, they were not socially distancing either ) sort of moving around the kitchen in a close group).. .  I will choose a different location for my bubble tea fix next time.
One of my favorite places in Charlotte. The staff is super nice. They have a really wide menu for milk tea.
Delicious and staff was amazing.
Delicious!! My favorite tea spot!!
My first Bubble tea... I'll be back!
üëå
Great customer service and tasty items. Slight mistake on my order and they corrected even though I ended up with extra. A little pricy but not too bad.
Strawberry volcano smoothie is great!
Nothing more refreshing than one of QC's iced milk Teas with bobas in it. üòã
The best teas and service in Charlotte NC

I would give them a better rating but they are inconsistent. My husband and I enjoyed our first date there, but when we went back to get the mangonada again they rang us up for the correct drink but gave us just a mango slushie then when we said something they told us they don't have it anymore. And it's still advertised in their photos. The food and drinks are good just sucks when you like something and come back for it and they don't have it anymore.

This was my very first time here so I didn't know what to order. The staff was very helpful in helping me decide on what to order & offered several suggestions. so I ended up ordering a milk green tea with mango flavors! So freaking delicious!!! Will definitely be back!
They have a great assortment of flavors and is one of the only tea bars in South Charlotte!
Delicious!

Super happy to have a tea bar in this area! Great options, friendly service, and tea tastes great. I've had to return from teaching in China due to the pandemic, so it's very nostalgic and comforting to pick up a boba that tastes just like back in Taiwan and the mainland. Thanks, guys!
Decent food and for non chain boba it's not bad. However, service is very slow and many times boba is chewy and stale.

I just left this place with the most amazing boba and experience ever. I wasn't sure what to get bc of all the options and awesome pictures I saw online so the girl upfront helped me. She was so nice and knowledgeable of all the products and gave me the perfect recommendation. I got a butterfly lemonade with rainbow jelly and it was AMAZING. I will definitely be back for more. üòä
Loved this place! Their classic milk bubble tea is great and their wings are amazinggg! Very cute vibe as well. Definitely recommend.
Great selection and friendly, helpful staff.
Bad service from one of the guy employe. And when one of my friend dropped his drink, they didn't offer a new drink like every other places but made him paid for another one.

Juicy chicken popcorn with fried basil making it taste more flavorful, but chicken was cut too small... If it was a little bigger, then I would consider giving five stars! Nevertheless, it is still worth a trip!

I've tried numerous bubble tea places not only in Charlotte but out of town as well and this one was the worst by far. My whole drink was pratically ICE. You literally pay about 5$ for a cup full of ice and some boba in the bottom (which was an extra charge). Even though the location was convenient to my workplace, I'll be going to the other bubble tea spots!
Thanks for making me waste 30mins for green tea with tapioca.  Loved seeing people that came in after me leave before me. Much appreciated (not).
They serve the boba quickly
Interesting drinks with lots of novel variety. Yummy ice cream and good finger food. There is something for everyone. Fun atmosphere.
They have good variety of drinks

Lots of options to choose from !! They give you a lot of room to be creative with your dream!! I tried the passion fruit green tea with lychee jelly and the Thai milk tea. Super yummy. Can't wait to try more.
My favorite place for Bubble Tea!

I can't speak about the food, but I will say they seem disorganized. I tried ordering from door dash. When the driver arrived they said they didnt have wings. They never called me. If it weren't for the driver contacting me. Take it off your menu if you dont carry or have. Get it together. Ridiculous

I am absolutely in LOVE with the Rose milk tea! Went there everyday during my stay in Charlotte. I decided to switch it up on the last day and switch to a tea that was described as a brown sugar milk tea. It was good, but I am too stuck on the Rose milk! So so good! Left - coconut milk tea right - Rose milk tea aka heaven in a queen sized cup!üëë
I dont like tea but this place changed my mind

So glad I stopped here with a friend of mine. The environment was nice and inviting, the drinks were fresh and delicious.The staff was helpful and friendly to me, a person new to the place.  I'll definitely be coming back again!
This place is awesome. I enjoyed my passion fruit green tea with lychee. Will be going back.
I get the vietnamese ice coffee and wow is the best ever. Also the spicy fried cauliflower is awesome. They have many different drinks and food. Great place. A little pricey but Good

Located in a little shopping strip off of Exit 3 on I-485, QC Tea Bar is a trendy, poppin', boba üç∏ servin', chicken üçó makin' eatery. With a modern interior, QC Tea Bar has a cool vibe with a light üí° atmosphere. While you're there, there are a handful of games (Jenga, etc.) that you can play. Interior was clean and well kept. Staff is great too! I tried the Wintermelon Tea üçµ and the Avocado ü•ë Smoothie. Both were extremely good, I recommend trying both. Avocado smoothie for a thick creamy taste and Wintermelon tea for a refreshing cool taste. Good work yo üëåüèºüëèüèº
I have been a customer at QCTB for a little over a year, great boba friendly staff awesome buffalo Cauliflower    Absolutely no complaints. Hands down best boba in town
Best Tea in Charlotte! Good variety!

Milk tea (guessing 20-24 oz?) with boba at $4.95 seems competitive for this area. For our first time, we tried the taro milk tea, but forgot to customize and ask for less sugar and more ice, so it was super sweet (common for taro powdered flavor) and not quite cold enough.  We'll have to try the other flavors and the small bites next time!  Update: came back and got their food combo. 6 wings + tea for $9.55 (basically just an extra $1.60 for the tea)! Also tried the spicy fried cauliflower bites for $4.50. Everything was delicious. The drums were extra big, and the cauliflower bites were crispy and had a nice kick.
Fast service great drinks
My new favorite place
The BEST Chicken wings in Charlotte. Note: prepare to wait 20+ minutes for a food order. Pictured: lemon pepper wings, combo with a Milk Tea with boba. Note: the Taro Slush wasn't creamy.
My go-to Boba spot!
This is an awesome place. We went with my family and we played some games that were provided, we had so much fun playing Jenga and drinking bubble tea
Great people and awesome boaba
best bone in wings EVER
Best avocado shake. Awesome fried tofu. I didn't think I'd like it but I loved it.

QC Tea Bar might be one of my favorite places in Charlotte to get boba tea. Their cute and cozy shop provides large menus along with a photo slide show of some of their popular items. Their food menu is small but the items listed to provide a hearty snack are tasty. They also have cute merchandise available for purchase. Great place to grab a drink and study at the window or play some games with friends. I will definitely return.
I don't go here as much but I love the drinks every time that I do go
Awesome boba teas, jasmine tea with aloe and Viet coffee with boba and grass jelly.

Generally love this place, but today not so much. Tried their wings today for the first time. Not good. The wings were way too BIG and they didnt taste like they were thoroughly cooked. The fries and slushie were good which gave them the "three" rating.
Delicious every time! Try the Rose Milk Tea.
Love going here. Food, drinks, and en environment is always on point. Love it! They have games to play at your table and a loyalty program so sign up and earn points!

My favorite boba tea place in Charlotte.  They have a huge selection of both teas and toppings, along with some nice snack foods. My favorite tea in the Raspberry Milk Tea with Lychee Jelly. It's the right amount of sweet and tart.
Boba was yummy and so was the waffle fries!!!

I went for the first time on a Monday. The employees handling the food and drinks were not wearing gloves or hair nets! The popcorn chicken was nasty, low quality chicken. I couldn't eat it and gave it to a coworker. The peach tea was not good, i wouldn't want it if it was free. The lady that took my order was nice.
Delicious milk tea (the coconut milk tea is amazing) and their food is really good too! Try the sweet potato fries. Must try place for sure!!
I've been here quite a few times and the drinks and food have always been on point.  Probably my favorite bubble tea place in Charlotte.
Love the matcha green tea with sea foam. Great spot!
There teas are amazing and there are beyond nice. They also have good wings.

I was craving bubble tea so we decided to finally check this place out since it's 5 minutes from where we live.  Apparently we are the only ones who didn't know how awesome this place was. We are there at 2:30 on a Sunday and it was pretty crowded.  The service was great. They were happy to offer recommendations. They also let us sample one of the milk teas and told us they would remake our drinks if we didn't like something.  We ended up getting a honey green milk tea with cheese cream and boba along with a taro milk tea with sea salt cream and boba. Both were really good. I preferred the cheese cream top over the sea salt cream.  We also tried their popcorn chicken. We got one with sweet chili and one with Korean BBQ sauce. I preferred the Korean BBQ sauce. The chicken didn't even need sauce though. It was very tender and flavorful. We got one with waffle fries and one when Cajun fries. Both fries were delicious.  We'll definitely be back here considering how good it was and how convenient the location is for us.

This place has a nice chill vibe to it. The staff is friendly and the drinks are pretty flavorful. I recommend the Thai Green Tea since it's one of my favorites. Of course majority of the drinks are delicious though. Let's not also forget how amazing the chicken popcorn is though. If you haven't tried it, YOU MUST!!! The regular flavoring is salt and pepper, but you do have the option to make it a bit spicy. The fries are delicious too. My go-to favorite is the sweet potato fries. The only downside is it gets soggy fast.

I adore this place. Not only is it unique to the area, but their tea selective is amazing which would matter less if they weren't so delicious!! Plenty of tea toppings to choose from like tapioca and matcha boba, among many others. Definitely recommended.
Good smoothies
One of the only places to get bubble tea in Charlotte!
Great place for Korean tea
Great staff and food, try the waffle Fry's
The bubble tea and popcorn chicken is amazing and unlike anything I've had from similar shops.
Nice atmosphere Very laid back Friendly workers Delicious cold  tea
Super cute place with great options! The staff helped me decide since I wasn't sure what would be a good combination--I got the lavender tea with crystal pearls and it was delish üòä
It had great bubble tea! It was a great first experience.
So glad to have a delicious, quality bubble tea option in the Charlotte area.
Always good service. Love the matcha tea smoothies!

When a bubble tea üçµ costs $7 there is a huge problem!  Most of the bubble tea üçµ places that I've been to around Atlanta include the first topping in the price.  But here in Charlotte this place is expensive and they charge you for everything.  Will not be returning!
Great quiet place with decent food and good drinks

So maybe I went on an off day, or a bad time. But it took about 20 minutes to get my $6.44 lemonade. Sure it was tasty, but definitely not worth over $3, or my being late to my appointment nearby. I went there on a whim as I had an appointment at 4:00 in the nearby office park. I got there about 3:40. I was fourth in line, as the group of three ahead of me had just ordered and sat down. I don't like to have caffeine that late, so I asked what options were caffeine free. There weren't many. So I got the lemonade. Figured it would be easy. Added a dollar for tip, bringing my total for a (maybe) 20oz cup of lemonade to $7.44. Far , far, too expensive. But the kid and straw were very nice, so I guess I was paying for those. The girl at the register seemed to be working hard, and there was another woman making food in the back. However it didn't seem as though the place was set up for efficiency.
Really good tea! The arae is good hang out too.
I wanted a while for my food, and they offered me a free drink. The food was really good hot an fresh.
Lots of options, you can customize too. They have rewards, discounts, merc. Casual setting and good vibes. Friendly staff. Recommend.
It's far from where I live but ever time I go it's worth the drive!!

This was a sad evening, I was craving a little treat and ordered a slice of the red velvet cake which looked great...  It was hard and stale - I ended up throwing it away - I've Never thrown away red velvet cake in my life before.  üò´
Great tea and very friendly environment. Prices are a bit expensive but worth it for the quality.
Wonderful place to go for a cup of hot or iced tea.  Their coffees are just as good too!
Great people
Taro Milk Tea was good . Pleasant staff and clean environment. Casual as you would expect from this type of business. Parking is easy and free and seating is ample.

Boba teas are amazing! Food is good. Like to take a break here and play a game or 2 while waiting
Bubble tea
good
Lots of great flavors and toppings.
Delicious and tasty high recommended
Went 2 different times and both experiences were great! The boba teas were delicious and reminded me of being home in Houston!!

I went here for the first time today. I usually order something I'm familiar with since I have bad luck when ordering something foreign-sounding. This time around I decided to try something new: taro milk tea. Never had taro or taro-flavored anything, but I've heard raves about it. Wow is all I can say! Addict at first sip. I love the variety of toppings you can add for an extra 50 cents. I went with the grass jelly topping and it was the perfect combination. I also ordered the spicy cauliflower wings. Delish! My sister ordered the peach milk tea with lychee toppings, and she loved it. I'm definitely coming back next time to get the Queen City-sized cup!

I love this place. It has amazing drinks and super friendly staff. Popcorn chicken  is  amazing wish it came with some kind of sweet sauce and some garnish. Other then that great flavor. They also have family friendly  games. Nice place to grab a quick drink or stay and sketch.  Overall this place is like a hidden  gem in the QC. üíé‚ù§
Delicious!

Phenomenal place with very detailed customer service and a highly pleasant atmosphere.  The drink selection is always rotating, and I've never (as a shamefully frequent customer) had anything I didn't absolutely love.  Conveniently located, friendly staff, and delicious goods. Highly recommend to anyone, and my friends all request it every time they come into town.  And while the drinks may be a tad on the high end, the value is incredible for the portion and quality!
Liked there bubble tea
Love the smoothies there. Recommended for sure
Friendly staff and delicious drinks! Nice atmosphere. Great to bring a group of friends to chill.  I recommend the honey Jasmine green tea. No added sugar.

Nice spot, although hidden.  The prices are ok, but a bit pricey, but the quality is good.  The place is clean and organized.  The tables are portable so if u have a big crowd of people, you can shift the tables and chairs to get all your friends in a spot.  The snacks are ok. A bit on the greasy side, for me.  If you are wondering, and NOT Asian, understand that is an Asian-themed place. So, there will be mostly Asian folks here.  My gf and I go here quite often. I'm mostly there playing Jenga with my Indian friend.  There are some board/card games, as well.
Best place for a date
Great classic Thai tea with tapioca boba
Nice chill spot tucked away in Whitehall with delicious drinks and awesome customer service
Great selection, really tasty

I've been here a few times now and they just keep bringing me back. I've heard complaints about speed of food being ready, but this isn't a fast food joint. It's a cozy place to enjoy some time. I'm definitely coming back
Great new place to gather with friends for a quick snack.
I love this place! I'm there like almost every day! I'm addicted!!!
Nice vibe. Very authentic. Cool crows and nice games to play

Place is amazing.  Decor is simple, chic and inviting.  Music is blasting there.  Staff is quick, super friendly, and made the drinks on point.  Love the extras like games available for friends/family to play and the free sample drinks near the pickup area.  Super spacious, tons of options, drinks/boba on point.  5 stars.
Great Place

Get the Tero milk tea, hot....DELICIOUS. Fun and welcome atmosphere with a good alternative to coffee.
Literally cutest place ever!

Awesome atmosphere, popcorn chicken is like crack and the tea ... Oh the tea!! So good
Definitely not fast. Ordered 2 drip coffees and 2 cappacinos, two caps took 15-20 min. 3 other parties were given their drinks before us. Don't waste your time if you want a quick drink
Love this place. If you are in the area and like tea, don't bother going anywhere else. Their Roasted Oolong milk tea is my favorite.
Very good tasting milk tea. Had taro, almond milk. Very comparable to other team places.
The tea here is amazing!
Enjoyed pineapple and mango tea...
Amazing teas and coffee
Love the tea here....they use real brew tea blk and green tea for the milk tea.....very clean and refreshing....must visit for tea lover
It is a nice place to hang out with friends Good Food Good Drinks and Good Environment
Great place and a great atmosphere. I love coming here! The service can definetly improve since we always have to wait a long time to get our drinks.
So I was the first one who took the order and I even tipped. I waited 20 minutes for popcorn chicke but the other people who came after me got their order first. First time there, bad impression.

Have you ever had a drink so good that you can't seem to put it down. You constantly have to drink it, and once you're done you want to get another one. If you like something sweet and with some tea flavor I recommend the green tea passion fruit with 50% sweet, it's delicious!
